name: Galactic Groove
description:
2D Shooter Project for the Michigan State University Specialization in Game Design and Development. 

Modifications done over the base project:

  • Design of three complete, new levels.
  • Creation of new music tracks (Main Menu, Level, Boss Level, Victory Theme) and SFX (Bonus Life)
  • Code updates to improve and implement some behaviours: created the +1Life bonus, changed the behaviour of player when hit (no more respawn, blinking effect)
  • Created enemies with new behaviours (static enemies keeping an eye on the player, mini-bosses who spawn enemies, boss with a new attacking pattern)
  • UI Changes: Lives count is now displayed, menus are updated...

Note: There seems to be an issue with the WebGL version, in which there is a delay before the tracks loop. 

Created by Vladimir "Kyoomei" Romero

All music by Vladimir "Kyoomei" Romero

Base code and assets provided by Michigan State University
